alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 11:07AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Elmore, south central Tallapoosa and north central Montgomery Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1107 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bob Woodruff Lake, or near Wetumpka, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Montgomery, Wetumpka, Tallassee, Elmore, Coosada, Eclectic, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Bob Woodruff Lake, Reeves Airport, Tallapoosa City, Emerald Mountain, Blue Ridge, Lagoon Park, Gunter Air Force Base, Claud, Yates Dam, Ware, Tallapoosa Water Plant and Reeltown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for south central, southeastern and east central Alabama.
